title: You'll Be Back
brief_description: Looks at the problems of readjustment that prisoners face on their release from gaol. The dramatisation of particular situations illustrates the type of troubles that may occur and representatives from various organisations, such as Legal Aid, Odyssey House and Personal Emergency Services, advise on how to avoid trouble
